title: In the case of land leased by the Government or Local Authorities, No Objection Certificate of Government or such Authorities shall be obtained if there is deviation from lease conditions and shall be attached to the application for development permission in respect of such land
clause_text: In the case of land leased by the Government or Local Authorities, No Objection Certificate of Government or such Authorities shall be obtained if there is deviation from lease conditions and shall be attached to the application for development permission in respect of such land. Such No Objection Certificate shall also be necessary, where, development proposal proposes to utilise FSI more than mentioned in the lease deed.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
